mapper.insert: insert into notification (receiver, sender, notification_type, additional_info) values (#{receiverId}, #{userId}, 'plan', #{planId})

insert into notification (receiver, sender, notification_type, additional_info) values

insert into notification (receiver, sender, notification_type) values (#{receiverId}, #{userId}, 'friend')
mapper.select: (select n.notification_id, n.receiver, n.sender, n.notification_type, u.name as additional_info from notification n, users u where n.receiver=#{userId} and n.sender=u.user_id and n.additional_info is null) union (select n.notification_id, n.receiver, n.sender, n.notification_type, p.title as additional_info from notification n, plan p where n.receiver=#{userId} and n.additional_info is not null and n.additional_info=p.plan_id) order by notification_id desc;
